---
title: "Summary table for EEG results"
author: "Raphael Q. Gastrock"
date: "2025-12-05"
output: html_document
---

Install and load in dependencies.

```{r}
#install.packages('kableExtra')
#install.packages('webshot2')

library(kableExtra)
library(webshot2)
source('ana/expsched.R')
```

Generate the table.

```{r}
data <- plotSummaryTable()
```

Edit formatting and apperance.

```{r}
 table_1 <- data %>%
    kbl(caption = "Table 1. Summary of EEG effects") %>%
    kable_classic(lightable_options = 'striped', html_font = 'Arial', row_label_position = 'c', full_width = T, font_size = 14) %>%
    pack_rows("movement preparation", 1, 5) %>%
    pack_rows("feedback processing", 6, 9) %>%
    column_spec(1, width = '1.75in') %>%
    column_spec(3, width = '2in')
  
```

Save to image.

```{r}
save_kable(table_1, "doc/fig/Tab1_Summary.png")
```
